meta.content: Front Page; New York and Region
meta.name: online_sections

block.p: Palestinians Mourn 18 Dead Palestinians marched in anger and mourning for 18 civilians killed by Israeli artillery. Israel's prime minister called the strike a mistake and offered to meet the Palestinian president to ease tensions.
Huge Victory for Rutgers Rutgers beat No. 3 Louisville, improving to 9-0 and raising the surprising possibility of the Scarlet Knights as national title contenders.
East German Spymaster Dies Markus Wolf, the elusive cold war spymaster of Communist East Germany known as ''the man without a face,'' died at 83.

Palestinians Mourn 18 Dead Palestinians marched in anger and mourning for 18 civilians killed by Israeli artillery. Israel's prime minister called the strike a mistake and offered to meet the Palestinian president to ease tensions.
Huge Victory for Rutgers Rutgers beat No. 3 Louisville, improving to 9-0 and raising the surprising possibility of the Scarlet Knights as national title contenders.
East German Spymaster Dies Markus Wolf, the elusive cold war spymaster of Communist East Germany known as ''the man without a face,'' died at 83.
